Hello,

According to https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1533, the problem with 
a confusing referrer header when fetching the robots.txt file should be 
fixed in Heritrix 1.14.3. But now, we got a complaint of a webmaster 
claiming the contrary. I started a quick test crawl on a local server and 
I still find lines like

172.20.16.132 - - [15/Feb/2010:17:14:44 +0100] "GET /robots.txt HTTP/1.0" 
404 274 "http://..." "Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; ...)" "-"

in the server's access.log.

Did I miss something?

Thanks in advance,
   Bert
